entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
